description:
This course will provide students with 5 steps to help them get to the root cause of why their overweight. It will teach why traditional methods don't work and provide a comprehensive and practical plan from a spiritual perspective to teach you exactly how to lose weight and keep it off.

The course will include videos, course notes, power-point presentations, an assessment and reflection questions.

This course is intended to be taken over the course of 5 days.

The course is structured in a way that students should watch 1 video first then complete the supplemental lesson plans that accompany it.

The course is essential if you're really ready to stop yo-yo dieting and are committed to getting to the root of what is behind your weight problems.
title: 5 Steps to Christian Weight Loss
